t: Why do Wayfair and Amazon often have different brand names for the exact same products? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Like everything else there is someone entering in the name of an item to a database, perhaps they put it in differently, or it could be to try to fool people doing matches online by using a different name they come up as the only seller of the item.
